name: BabyAGIChatGPT (Doriandarko)
description: [项目级] A ChatGPT plugin to run BabyAI directly in the chat interface。来源: https://github.com/Doriandarko/BabyAGIChatGPT

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A ChatGPT plugin to run BabyAI directly in the chat interface

来源: https://github.com/Doriandarko/BabyAGIChatGPT
语言: Python
Stars: 375

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: pip install openai quart quart-cors pinecone-client

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
ai-plugin.json
logo.png
main.py
openapi.yaml
poetry.lock
pyproject.toml
readme.md

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
The plugin provides several API endpoints to interact with BabyAGI:

- `/set_objective`: Set the main objective for BabyAGI.
- `/add_task`: Add a task to the task list.
- `/get_task_list`: Retrieve the current task list.
- `/execute_next_task`: Execute the next task in the task list and create new tasks based on the result.
